DOC.brief_summary: Primary aim study investigate wether evidence-based physiotherapy regimen effective standard care patient refer arthroscopic surgery shoulder . It hypothesize multimodal physiotherapy regimen relieve pain , improve shoulder function reduce need subacromial decompression surgery shoulder compare standard care/wait see control .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Evidence-based Physiotherapy Regimen Patients With Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: There fourfold increase surgery rate non-traumatic shoulder disorder , despite increase evidence demonstrate difference effect physiotherapy based- surgical intervention . The target population study patient suffer rotator cuff tendinopathy wait subacromial decompression surgery university hospital Norway . During wait period , study participant randomly assign standard follow physiotherapy regimen primary care . We want compare effect structure physiotherapy regimen consist heavy slow resistance exercise , stretch , manual mobilization low level laser therapy standard follow .
DOC.criteria: Patients need surgery ( placed surgical wait list hospital refer surgery GP ) 1 . Typical history difficulty work arm elevate head , pain locate upper segment C5 dermatome . 2 . Symptom duration minimum 3 month . 3 . Three reproducible sign rotator cuff tendinopathy / subacromial impingement : Positive isometric abduction and/or lateral rotation ( Ombregt , Bisschop & Veer , 2003 ) Painful arc active abduction ( Ombregt , Bisschop & Veer , 2003 ) Positive Neers sign ( Neer , 1972 ; Tennent , Beach & Meyers , 2003 ) Positive Jobes test ( Jobe & Moynes , 1982 ; Tennent , Beach & Meyers , 2003 ) Positive HawkinsKennedy impingement test ( Hawkins & Kennedy , 1980 ) 1 . Shoulder pain due trauma , e.g . fall . 2 . Reduced ROM consistent adhesive capsulitis/frozen shoulder 3 . History combination examination test ( apprehension/relocation ) , give reason suspect pathological instability 4 . Full thickness rupture rotator cuff tendon 5 . OA glenohumeral joint , Os acromiale decrease space subacromial space , previous fracture shoulder complex shoulder surgery symptomatic side . 6 . Subjects comorbidity : Rheumatological neurological disease , fibromyalgia symptom cervical spine 7 . Subjects suffer serious psychiatric illness . 8 . Subjects unable understand English Norwegian . 9 . Less 3 positive reproducible sings rotator cuff pathology / subacromial disease .
